text: Akdamar Island (also known as Aghtamar, Ahktamar, and Aght'amar; Armenian: Աղթամար, Kurdish: Axtamar) is a small island in Lake Van in the Eastern Anatolia region of Turkey. == Other websites == * The Surp Hach (Saint Cross) church on Akhtamar Island Category:Islands of Turkey Category:Armenian Apostolic Churches Category:Eastern Anatolia Region
title: Akdamar Island
